daily_tasks: Ensure all waste bins in common areas are emptied by the end of each day
Wipe down high-touch surfaces in the kitchen and break room, such as countertops and the microwave handle, before leaving for the day
Clean up personal messes at desk
weekly_tasks: Vacuum the main office carpet every Monday morning
Clean and disinfect all conference room tables and chairs on Tuesday and Thursday
Clean the windows in the main reception area by the end of the day on Friday
important_notes: Refer to the cleaning SOP document for detailed instructions on specific tasks, including the use of cleaning supplies and equipment
contact_information: Contact Tolkie at 0012345678910 for any issues or questions
purpose: Maintaining a clean and healthy environment for everyone
